name: Tiera Vulpes in: Operation Dynamite
description:
You play as Tiera Vulpes, interstellar crime fighter, rescuring the planet of Sahra from the evil forces of Admiral Taurus! You must traverse through six worlds, of platforming goodness, to rescue the princess and five citizens from Taurus' army and bring the end to Admiral Taurus!

UPDATE: minor graphical and mechanical fixes; Level 5A has level edit
